summary: Now you can call out to block the sun without using any bloodcursed arrows!
descriptionHtml:
I was quite disappointed that the only way you could block out the sun was through using bloodcursed arrows. So I made a power from this spell instead, to make it a little more difficult to get your hands on this spell I have hidden it in somewhere in the \"Forgotten Vale\" 

I have added spoiler pictures in a folder named: SPOILER

For those who don\'t want to use their time in searching for the book.

Small update: Added a mediafire link in the mirrors section, should the download from the nexus become too slow, use the mirror.

-----=Tiny update=-----
Changed the equip spell to voice instead of either hands, should work properly for everyone now!
author: Passet
